full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

* **Title/Titre (English/French)**: EC095-230006 Remote Monitoring and Service Operation (RMSO) - Juice and Soda
* **Reference Number/Numero de reference**: WS4220662910-Doc4221258531
* **Amendment Number/Numero de Modification**: 5
* **Solicitation Number/Numero de Sollicitation**: WS4220662910
* **Publication Date/Date de Publication**: 2023-11-23
* **Tender Closing Date/Date limite pour la réception des offres**: 2024-01-08T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date/Date de la modification**: 2023-12-11

### Request Details

* **Procurement Category/Categorie d'approvisionnement**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method/Méthode d'approvisionnement**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria/Criteres de selection**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements/Accords commerciaux**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity/Régions d'opportunités**: None

### Contracting Entity Details

* **Contracting Entity Name/Nom de l'entité contractante (English/French)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)/Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contracting Entity Address/Ligne d'adresse de l'entité contractante (English/French)**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage/Gatineau, Quebec/K1A 0S5, Canada

### Notice Information

* **Notice URL/URL de l'avis (English/French)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18091345?extsite=MTgwOTEzNDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Description/Description de l'appel d'offres

Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence and Coast Guard Canada, invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for the provision of juice and soda products on an as-and-when-requested basis. A Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) will be awarded for a one-year period.

The contract requires the supplier to provide and deliver these products to zones in Nova
